Title: Microsoft Teams: Bi-directional Calendar Syncing between Google Workspace and Microsoft Teams
Description: Businesses using Google Workspace for email and calendaring can now enable bidirectional synchronization with Microsoft Teams through the Teams Admin app. This enhanced sync ensures that events created in either platform are seamlessly reflected in both, improving scheduling efficiency and minimizing the risk of missed meetings.
